医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
开发可穿戴传感器通过眼球运动检测大脑疾病休斯顿大学工程团队开发了可穿戴传感器来检查眼球运动，以评估大脑疾病或大脑损伤。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240916/Wearable-sensors-development-to-detect-brain-disorders-through-eye-movement.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240916/Wearable-sensors-development-to-detect-brain-disorders-through-eye-movement.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=fc702c0e-3152-4665-82ac-d82b3f0c1c3e Mon, 16 Sep 2024 21:02:11 -0400 Wearable sensors developed to detect brain disorders through eye movement
加州大学研究探索医院环境中 MRSA 的空气传播即使在大流行后的世界，一线医护人员也面临着许多职业挑战，接触感染就是其中之一。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240916/UC-study-explores-airborne-transmission-of-MRSA-in-hospital-settings.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240916/UC-study-explores-airborne-transmission-of-MRSA-in-hospital-settings.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=98d17112-1972-435e-ad24-7b17a14c8c00 Mon, 16 Sep 2024 20:45:41 -0400 UC study explores airborne transmission of MRSA in hospital settings
新研究揭示了整个怀孕期间大脑的动态变化怀孕是一个人一生中的一个转变时期，身体会经历快速的生理适应，为成为母亲做好准备；我们都知道。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240916/New-research-reveals-dynamic-brain-changes-throughout-pregnancy.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240916/New-research-reveals-dynamic-brain-changes-throughout-pregnancy.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a6b218d2-c3e1-497f-aed6-aad52ebd02c Mon, 16 Sep 2024 20:41:35 -0400 New research reveals dynamic brain changes throughout pregnancy
护理人员的粮食不安全影响儿科住院的结果粮食不安全是指营养充足且安全的食品供应有限或不确定，与健康状况不佳和使用医疗保健服务的需求增加有关。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240916/Caregiver-food-insecurity-impacts-outcomes-of-pediatric-hospitalizations.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240916/Caregiver-food-insecurity-impacts-outcomes-of-pediatric-hospitalizations.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5bdb397f-0cb2-4117-ae54-ce197bd22154 Mon, 16 Sep 2024 20:37:34 -0400 Caregiver food insecurity impacts outcomes of pediatric hospitalizations
新研究发现人工智能模型的阿片类药物治疗建议没有偏见麻省总医院布里格姆分校研究人员的一项新研究提供的证据表明，用于生成人工智能 (AI)、ChatGPT-4 和谷歌 Gemini 的大语言模型 (LLM) 表明，针对不同种族或性别的建议阿片类药物治疗方案没有差异。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240916/New-study-finds-no-bias-in-opioid-treatment-suggestions-by-AI-models.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240916/New-study-finds-no-bias-in-opioid-treatment-suggestions-by-AI-models.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d7d42405-b264-4f1a-8b50-3ffc0545c223 Mon, 16 Sep 2024 20:28:00 -0400 New study finds no bias in opioid treatment suggestions by AI models
新型递送平台增强癌症免疫疗法的有效性并减少副作用免疫疗法是一种癌症治疗方法，利用人体自身的免疫系统来帮助对抗癌症。这是通过刺激免疫反应来更有效地识别和攻击癌细胞。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240916/Novel-delivery-platform-enhances-efficiency-of-cancer-immunotherapy-and-reduces-side-effects.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240916/Novel-delivery-platform-enhances-efficiency-of-cancer-immunotherapy-and-reduces-side-effects.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9e47f3dd-0aa1-4912-a296-7c82b0d0f18f Mon, 16 Sep 2024 20:20:50 -0400 Novel delivery platform enhances effectiveness of cancer immunotherapy and reduces side effects
揭示早期胚胎 DNA 组织背后的机制Kind Group 的研究人员对早期胚胎细胞内 DNA 空间组织背后的机制有了新的认识。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240916/Unveiling-the-mechanism-behind-DNA-organization-in-early-embryos.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240916/Unveiling-the-mechanism-behind-DNA-organization-in-early-embryos.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a9161875-806c-47f7-9e85-82faed094786 Mon, 16 Sep 2024 20:15:10 -0400 Unveiling the mechanism behind DNA organization in early embryos
研究揭示社会经济不平等与年龄相关性黄斑变性风险之间的联系上海交通大学医学院和复旦大学的研究人员最近进行的一项研究表明，社会经济地位（SES）不平等与患年龄相关性黄斑变性（AMD）的风险之间存在显着关联。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240916/Study-reveals-link- Between-socioeconomic-inequality-and-the-risk-of-age-lated-maulous-degenesis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240916/Study-reveals-link- Between-socioeconomic-inequality-and-the-risk-of-age-lated-maulous-degenesis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=bce18279-d4d1-4e46-9151-db0ad67ca735 Mon, 16 Sep 2024 20:09:41 -0400 Study reveals link between socioeconomic inequality and the risk of age-related macular degeneration
了解亚裔美国人心血管健康的社会决定因素根据发表的一项新的科学声明，许多社会和结构因素，包括移民身份、社会经济地位和获得医疗保健的机会，导致亚裔美国人心血管健康和心脏病风险的差异，并且这些因素以不同的方式影响亚裔亚裔群体今天发表在美国心脏协会的期刊《循环》上。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240916/Understanding-the-social-determinants-of-cardioangio-health-in-Asian-Americans.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240916/Understanding-the-social-determinants-of-cardioangio-health-in-Asian-Americans.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7bd62d75-9b7d-4710-bbf4-6b40232e833f Mon, 16 Sep 2024 20:05:01 -0400 Understanding the social determinants of cardiovascular health in Asian Americans
SARS-CoV-2 暴露使受感染成年人的体重指数稳定，而其他人则出现变化现实世界的研究揭示了 SARS-CoV-2 感染如何影响体重指数，显示受感染个体的 BMI 稳定，而未暴露人群和大流行前群体的 BMI 则出现变化。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240916/SARS-CoV-2-exposure-stabilizes-BMI-in-infected-adults-while-others-see-shifts.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240916/SARS-CoV-2-exposure-stabilizes-BMI-in-infected-adults-while-others-see-shifts.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e38b159f-8c2f-4c79-8414-62525c9ed09a Mon, 16 Sep 2024 19:24:00 -0400 SARS-CoV-2 exposure stabilizes BMI in infected adults while others see shifts
